nodes.text: This woman was the wife of the Imperial Army General Maximilian Veers and the mother of Zevulon Veers. While on vacation with her family, she contracted a rare disease and passed away. Veers was devastated by her loss and dedicated his life to the Imperial Army while raising Zevulon to honor his mother's memory by becoming a loyal Imperial youth. Zevulon began to grow apart from his father over the years and missed the warmth of his mother's smile.
